to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: Problems with speechd-up-0.4
body:
Jim Wantz  writes:

> Hi,
> I am on a Debian unstable system.  I am running speechd-dispatcher-0.6.2. 
> When attempting to configure my makefile it exits with the message that it 
> is unable to find the speech library.  However a listing of /usr/lib 

Install the libspeechd-dev package, and all should be well.
-- Chris
